pullrequest.title: fix #2600 - remove prepending of additional -l with Boost_PKGCONFIG_LIBS

content.raw:
Thanks for the contribution!

Do you mind converting the tabs to 2 spaces each so that the indentation matches? In my web browser, the difference is visible, and we prefer to use 2 spaces instead of tabs in most cases.
content.html:
Thanks for the contribution!

Do you mind converting the tabs to 2 spaces each so that the indentation matches? In my web browser, the difference is visible, and we prefer to use 2 spaces instead of tabs in most cases.
